statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -10 \\ 14 \\ -2 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -13 \\ 17 \\ 0 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
